Package jwiki.core

Contains the main classes in jwiki.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Auth
    Perform wiki authentication and initialization tasks for a Wiki.
    MQuery
    Perform multi-title queries.
    NS
    Contains default namespaces and methods to get non-standard namespaces.
    Reply
    Represents a reply from the server.
    Req
    Class used to do GET/POST requests.
    RSet
    High level functions to select and extract values from a list Reply objects.
    Settings
    Constants and global Settings for jwiki.
    SQ
    A template server query object that can be used to make a variety of queries.
    URLBuilder
    Builds a URL with the specified domain.
    WAction
    Performs an action on a wiki.
    Wiki
    Main class of libjwiki.
    WTask
    Class containing static methods which can perform miscellaneous tasks pertaining to MediaWiki.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ColorLog
    Colors a String and logs it to console.

Package jwiki.core Description

Contains the main classes in jwiki. Most of the classes here contain protected/private members which abstract the nasty/complicated details which do not, and should not concern the typical programmer. These classes all serve Wiki.java; for most users, this is the only class you're going to need.
Author:
Fastily
